title: Grab Samsung’s Galaxy Tab S6 Lite for 13% OFF!
description: Folks after the S6 Lite might want to check out this deal, which takes down its price a notch. The post Grab Samsung’s Galaxy Tab S6 Lite for 13% OFF! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Folks after the S6 Lite might want to check out this deal, which takes down its price a notch.
text: Samsung’s relaunch of the Galaxy Tab S6 Lite is proof that it’s become a fan-favourite device, and it still manages to stand out from the rest of the competition thanks to a premium design, a bundled S-Pen, as well as decent performance. With that in mind, folks after the S6 Lite might want to check out this deal, which takes down its price a notch. The Galaxy Tab S6 Lite manages to remain somewhat future-proof thanks to its sleek metal build, which wraps around a large and clear 10.4-inch display. The tablet also comes with stereo speakers and expandable storage, making it ideal for streaming content or accessing locally-stored media files. It also comes with a newer Exynos chip inside, as well as Samsung’s latest Android features. You can check it out using the link below. A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart.
